independent_factors.description: Per-ticker factors computed from price data

factors.compute_log_return_y: Compute log return within same hourly bar. Formula: ln(Close/Open)
factors.compute_return_1h: Compute 1-hour log return. Formula: ln(Close_t / Close_t-1)
factors.compute_return_5h: Compute 5-hour log return. Formula: ln(Close_t / Close_t-5)
factors.compute_macd: Compute MACD line. Formula: EMA(12) - EMA(26)
factors.compute_macd_signal: Compute MACD signal line. Formula: EMA(9) of MACD
factors.compute_macd_hist: Compute MACD histogram. Formula: MACD - Signal
factors.compute_price_range: Compute price range within bar. Formula: (High-Low)/Open
factors.compute_sector_return: Compute sector ETF return for a ticker.

shared_factors.description: Market and economic factors shared across all tickers

factors.compute_fed_rate: Get Federal Funds Rate (forward-filled to hourly).

shared_all: shared_factors (SPY, VIX, QQQ, IWM returns, Fed rate, CPI)
